summary: A command‑line utility that loads a NeMo model, gathers all checkpoint (.ckpt) files located alongside the original .nemo archive, computes the element‑wise average of their weights, and writes a new averaged model file with a '-averaged.nemo' suffix. It can operate on a single model or be invoked in bulk via shell pipelines, and includes an option to supply additional import files for custom classes.
business_intent: Enable users to create averaged model checkpoints for NeMo models, improving model stability and performance through weight averaging while simplifying deployment and version management.
